p: As natural emissions and their effects in the YRD under future climate conditions have been studied [ 8], the impacts of climate change on individual processes of O 3 formation are discussed in this paper. The remainder of this paper is organized as follows. The model, its configurations, and the input data are introduced in Section 2. The validation of model performance, the change in future meteorology, the impact of climate change on O 3, its precursors, and O 3â€“NO X-VOC sensitivity are discussed in Section 3. Finally, a brief summary is given in Section 4.
